comment.author: 32625786@N04
comment._content: Love looking at old navy ships.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/32625786@N04] I love looking at the sailors! No doubt this will lead to sniggering from some of you (you know who you are!), but look at the nonchalant leaning, the smoking, the chatting... And look at the guy in the middle on Boat 63 who's been captured in the act of drinking from a huge metal container!
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 68694529@N03
comment._content: An example of a photograph snatching a moment from the distant past.

comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: Fantastic old picture, just what we like to see here.  Thank you very much for sharing this one,any more like this?

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/alimarante] Tons! Have a look at these: Bullock No. 1 Donegal Fisherman Secret Destination Barque August 25, 1906 There's loads more too! Just have a bit of an explore...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment._content: Looks to me as if they had been moving coal.
